page.title: 04TRADE IN FELMINGHAM
page.content: There is only one shop in the Village which sells fresh food and vegetables. It is a family run business linked with a national wholesalers. They also stock stationary, basic medical supplies and toiletries, toys and a few clothes.The Sub-Post Office is situated in a wooden shed behind a private house. Pensions and Social Security Allowances may be obtained there, as can stamps and postal orders. Many small-holders sell their surplus produce from stalls by the road-side.Fresh meat, fish and bread are delivered regularly by van from either North Walsham or Aylsham. There is also a second-hand car business; and a pottery whose wares can be purchased from their own shop.
